Reviews.Title: “nice hotel... poor reception staff”
Reviews.Author: magicfairy444
Reviews.Content: stayed sept 2011 started badly 10 hours traveling arrived airport expecting greeted hotel pick pre arranged transfers hotel confirmed numerous times email half hour searching transport taxi cost £12 gbp arrived explained happened reception staff unhelpful snotty refused refund taxi fare wouldnt accept fault unfortunatly access internet unable emails prove arrangements tried holiday cleaning staff restuarant kitchen staff lovely friendly polite lovely security guard feel safe talkative porter cleaned day size hotel location price minutes metro allowing excellent links main dubai able buy day pass metro takes £250 struggle resturant hotel eating town mean halfboard pretty pointless time main bit dubai hotel respect recomend bb food included package half board wasnt breakfest limited toast cereals boiled eggs chips sausage days lunch mainly curry rice potato service food options salads pizzas deserts twice found nice 4th floor front didnt suffer noise hotel 2 night clubs hotel pool roof didnt actually everytime pretty roof space nice rest sun bit mixed review hope helps hotel nice

Reviews.Title: “Very best for the money!”
Reviews.Author: Jogil415
Reviews.Content: stayed eureka times recommend hesitation comfortable located food staff exceptional tour set helpful dealing city tours arranged shuttle airport

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff,pleasant stay.”
Reviews.Author: idinovsky
Reviews.Content: stayed eureka april wife infant attending conference nearby hotel price reasonable neat cozy staff eager help cheerful environment offers lot restaurants shopping malls walking distance downside include hardly taxi drivers overall offers value money dr
